tool.name: PlotPCA_GG

param.name: group_lvl
param.label: Extract level for labels of groups. 1 for groups, 2 for specimens

param.name: speci_lvl
param.label: Extract level for labels of Specimen. 1 for groups, 2 for specimens

tool.help: This module plots the Principal Components Analysis from Landmarks2Wireframe. You can select the level of icons for groups / species and the level for samples / museumIDs. Use 1 for species level and 2 for specimen numbers.
